name: Mega Man: Battle Chip Challenge (Wii U)
name_original: Mega Man: Battle Chip Challenge (Wii U)
description:
Play as characters from the Mega Man Battle Network Universe, and help
them win the Battle Chip Grand Prix! Each character has their own Net
Navi--a unique program alter-ego that can navigate through the
Internet--and will be competing against other network battlers for the
ultimate prize!

Strategize Battle Chips that activate attacks, healing, or specialized
moves on a grid called a Program Deck. Complete each duel by defeating
your opponent or having the most chips left in your Program Deck.
Purchase new Battle Chips to equip for the next duel. Eliminate
opponents from the tournament, and claim the title of champion!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
